Text:
I like this game the first real Organised crime game  without those lame 4 yearold jokes this is the real deal if you liked GTA but felt it lacked real flavour. Here you have a real drug runners game with alot of cool cars and good plot. And also a much larger area to play on. Forget GTA forget Godfather this is  THE gangster game. 

Btw at first i felt bad i couldnt use my personal keyboard setup but that awkward feeling soon diappeared and now i can't get enough of it!
Hoppas att det inte är några negrer som laddar ned denna...

This is one of the worst games of 2006. Lousy controls, pathetic plot, miserable graphics, it's incredibly dull and linear, and lacks any kind of good physics or even simple logic...

It's not worth your time even the least bit...

"Det här programmet kunde inte startas eftersom d3dx9_29.dll inte kunde hittar. Det här problemet kanske kan rättas till genom att du installerar om programmet."

Hur ska jag fixa detta? Har provat med att installera om men det hjälper inte!
Prova här: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?d3dx9_29

Crack works, however at first I was getting an error unrelated to directx.  Guess what, the official forums it seems have alot of people moaning about bugs.  Companies wonder why people pirate.  Well you fucked the people that paid for the game so what do you expect.  The fix for my problem was simply, unplug my joypad and joystick.  It now runs, but due to having a Sound blaster Live 5.1 the game loses sound after the intro, apprently another bug.

So lessons to be learnt.  NO piracy does NOT mean you tend to get no working copies. Actually buying the game with hard earned cash to fill the fat cat pockets, on a console port that hasn't even been play tested properly 'cause "We must rush this out before Christmas and in time for the dvd release so we can cash in.  Fuck testing it for bugs, fuck our customers, just release it, release it NOW.  The PC games they won't be aload to return anyway, so fuck 'em, we got their money, we don't fucking care.  Anyone think we've been watching Scarface to much?  Nope we've always been fat cat swearing cunts like this :)".

So until I can get my sound working in game that is a BUG and nothing to do with the cracked pirate copy, I'll hold out and see if this is any good.  If this is a port then the XBox 360 is a rip off as the graphics are GTA Vice City style.  The controls seem ok so far except Scarfaces movement.
